text_block_list.text:
Heeeeeeeeeeeelp!! 
Help Meeeeeeeeee!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Oh my Trainer-san!! 
Help Me!! Please save me!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: The truth is, I'm… being chased!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, by an Uma Musume that's so scary… 
No! By an Uma Anego…!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Stop right there!! 
So this is where you were, Taiki!!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
Nooooooooooo!! 
Uma Anego, is super faaaaaaast!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: Who are you calling [Uma Anego], huh?!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
Help!! Trainer-san, 
Help meeeeeee~~~!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: …Taiki Shuttle hid behind me.

…are you, Taiki's trainer? 
Sorry, but I'm gonna need you to hand her over.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
That Taiki, she knows it's past curfew but is trying to leave the 
dorms. As the Mihono Dorm Leader, I can't let that slide.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: So, hand her over!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
No! No! Nooooooo! 
Pleeeeeeeeease don't hand me over!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: I pulled Taiki Shuttle out from behind me, and handed her over.
What?! Trainer-san?!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Aha ha ha ha! Taiki, looks like you've got 
a really outstanding and understanding trainer, don't you?!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's go!! 
I hope you're prepared for a striiiiiiict lecture!!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: Noooooooooooooo!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: And so, Taiki Shuttle's scream echoed in to the empty night…
…A few minutes later.

Hmmmmm, 
We can't seem to find both of them…!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: That's a bit troubling~…
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Ah!! Sorry, you over there!! Have you seen 
Hishi Ama-senpai and Taiki-senpai around here?!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
choice_data_list: <size=36>If it's Taiki, she was just taken to get scolded.</size>
<size=36>If it's Taiki, she was just taken to get scolded.</size>

text_block_list.text:
Ahhhhhhh! Condor's failure…! 
So, we didn't make it in time…!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Looks like Hishi Ama-senpai has a 
misunderstanding about Taiki-senpai, doesn't she…?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
While it's true that Taiki-senpai was breaking curfew by leaving 
the dorm… she was doing it for our sakes.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
For both Grass and me, 
both of our parents are in a far away country…
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Since we're in a similar circumstance to Taiki-senpai, 
she wanted to hold a party for us so we wouldn't be lonely!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
It was very lively, and we were having fun but… part way 
through, we realized we were running out of food.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Seeing that, Taiki-senpai 
said [I'll secretly sneak out and buy some!]…
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
That time at the Selection Race comes to mind, where her 
concentration was broken because she realized that other Uma 
Musume was in bad shape and needed help.

There's a part of her that's a bit too spirited but, she's very 
aware of the people around her, and always using her full 
strength to help them. She must really care about her friends.
choice_data_list: (…I need to go to where Taiki is!)

text_block_list.text:
Since El Condor Pasa and Grass Wonder explained the situation to 
me, I headed in the direction that Taiki Shuttle was taken.

Uuu, I won't do it again… 
Wait, huh…?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
choice_data_list: <size=42>Hishi Amazon! I have something to say</size>
<size=42>Hishi Amazon! I have something to say</size>

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san?!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: You're, the one from before…
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: …What is it that you have to say?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
I tell Hishi Amazon about the situation that I heard 
from El Condor Pasa and Grass Wonder.

…Hmmmm? So that's what's going on here. 
So that's why you wouldn't spill the beans no matter what. 
You didn't want anything to happen to your kouhai, huh?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: W-well that's…
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Well, part way through you started going on about [The party…], 
so I figured there was something going on there.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
choice_data_list: <size=38>Could you try not to scold her too much…?</size>
<size=38>Could you try not to scold her too much…?</size>

text_block_list.text:
…No way. Hishi Ama-neesan isn't that sweet. 
I'm gonna have to give out some seeeeeerious punishment!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: Hiiii?!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
On the shelf in the dorm's kitchen, there's a box filled with 
snacks and stuff. Just so you know, it's reeeeeally heavy, okay?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
Bring that to my room, 
and bring El and Grass along with you!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
…Eh? 
Is that, possibly…
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
We're gonna continue that encouragement party in my room! Geez, 
listening to your situation made me remember my hometown too.
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
With all the American-born girls gathered up, 
we're gonna party through the night!
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text:
…!! Hishi Ama-saaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!! 
Thank youuuuuuuuu~~~!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Ehehe… thank you too Trainer-san! 
Seeing you come here, made me really really happy!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right!! Why don't you come to the party too?! 
C'mon! It'll be fun, for sure!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
…No, trainers are normally restricted from entering the dorms, 
so that's not gonna happen, okay?
text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon

text_block_list.text: Nooo! How unfair, Trainer-san…!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: All by my lonesome self, I made my way back home…

Noooooooooooo!! 
Traaaaaaainer-saaaaaan!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
